channel.title: Global wilderness
channel.description: What needs to be changed on the game server to enable PVP anywhere without combat or wilderness level restrictions? I have been over every wilderness reference and spent far too much time trying trial and error to change the wilderness boundaries but nothing has worked.

item.title: Global wilderness
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

You should get on skype…

Read full topic

item.title: Global wilderness
item.dc:creator: @cleako cleako
item.description:
@cleako wrote:

Had a feeling it would be client-sided also. Next thing will be getting the client to check with the server to see if trading and dueling should be shown on the right click menu. Already set up the options to disable them server-side.

Read full topic

item.title: Global wilderness
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

You need to remove the client-sided check for wilderness level, then you’ll need to allow attacking in the checkAttack method in Player class.

Read full topic
